text: Sheila Mercier (1 January 1919 â€“ 4 December 2019) was an English actress. She was born in Hull, East Riding of Yorkshire, England. She played Annie Sugden in Emmerdale for over 20 years between 1972 and 1994, she made 3 further appearances in 1995, 1996 and 2009. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Actors from Yorkshire Category:British military personnel of World War II Category:English television actors Category:People from Kingston upon Hull Category:English centenarians
